body: ~If we remove the option, then their won't be an `inference_ctx` and its data will be embedded within `TFE_Op`~ After reflexion, even without the option, the inference must remain conditional to handle function ops.
body_html: If we remove the option, then their won't be an inference_ctx and its data will be embedded within TFE_Op After reflexion, even without the option, the inference must remain conditional to handle function ops.
